MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Cpu.IContextSwitchDataSource> UseContextSwitchData (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Cpu.IContextSwitchDataSource> UseContextSwitchData(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed

static member UseContextSwitchData : Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource -> Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Cpu.IContextSwitchDataSource>

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about processor context switches.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about processor context switches.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the CPU Usage (Precise) table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Cpu.ICpuSampleDataSource> UseCpuSamplingData (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Cpu.ICpuSampleDataSource> UseCpuSamplingData(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseCpuSamplingData (trace As ITraceSource) As IPendingResult(Of ICpuSampleDataSource)
static member UseCpuSamplingData : Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource -> Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Cpu.ICpuSampleDataSource>

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about CPU usage based on periodic sampling of the instruction pointer.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about CPU usage based on periodic sampling of the instruction pointer.

remarks.para: Since this data is sampled, it is only as precise as the sampling interval. A sampling interval of 1 millisecond is common.
Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the CPU Usage (Sampled) table.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about CPU thread scheduling, including context switches and ready thread events.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about CPU thread scheduling, including context switches and ready thread events.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the CPU Usage (Precise) table.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about Interrupt Service Routine (ISR) and Deferred Procedure Call (DPC) activity.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about Interrupt Service Routine (ISR) and Deferred Procedure Call (DPC) activity.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the DPC/ISR table.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data about processor last branch record (LBR) activity during a trace.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data about processor last branch record (LBR) activity during the trace.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Latest Branch Records table.

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about processor performance counter values from Processor Counter Monitor (PCM).
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data about processor performance counter values from Processor Counter Monitor (PCM).
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer does not currently provide this data.
